alert.note: Alert for Allen; De Kalb; Lagrange; Noble; Steuben; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 2:03AM EDT until July 29 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Steuben County in northeastern Indiana... Northwestern Allen County in northeastern Indiana... Noble County in northeastern Indiana... Northern Whitley County in northeastern Indiana... Western De Kalb County in northeastern Indiana... Southern Lagrange County in northeastern Indiana... * Until 245 AM EDT. * At 203 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Middlebury to near Syracuse to near Winona Lake, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, Auburn, Kendallville, Columbia City, Angola60, Garrett, Ligonier, Lagrange, Tri-lakes, Huntertown, Avilla, Albion, Waterloo, Churubusco, Rome City, Topeka, Swan, Etna, Wolcottville, and Ashley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; De Kalb; Lagrange; Noble; Steuben; Whitley
